topics.body:
"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53712b7863687251da9c0000#post_53712b7863687251da9c0000
Piece of advice start looking for a job in your last year of college, save enough money to move, and just general same stuff.


Also I finally got my financial aid for college sorted out; short version is some idiot had a bug in the system that would boot out hundreds of people and as a result you would have to reapply.  I don't know about you, but that seems not efficient cause if you're having to redo hundreds of financial aids then think of how much money is being wasted.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
